instructions:
Combine wine, water, parsley and onion and heat to boiling. Add scallops and simmer 5 minutes. Drain
and reserve 1/2 cup of broth.
Sauté mushrooms in margarine; blend in flour with salt and pepper. Add soup, cream and lemon juice;
cook and stir until thickened. Add reserved broth and fold in scallops. Place in Pyrex casserole and sprinkle
mixture of Parmesan, crumbs and butter over scallops. Broil 3 inches from heat 4 or 5 minutes or until
lightly brown.
name: Scallops Coquille
